patterns.comment: Match identifiers in ALL_CAPS as constants, except when followed by `.`, `(`, `'`, or `"`.
patterns.name: constant.other.allcaps.python

patterns.comment: keyword operators that evaluate to True or False
patterns.name: keyword.operator.logical.python

patterns.comment: keywords that do not fit into other groups.
patterns.name: keyword.other.python

patterns.comment:
Keywords that delimit flow blocks or alter flow from within a   block.
   This block should be matched *after* meta.function.python to   let 'async def' be matched *first*.
patterns.match: (?x) \b(asínc | aguarda | rompe | continúa | osi | otro | excepto | alfin | para |si | omite | lanza | devuelve | intenta | mientras | con |(genera(?:\s+de)?))\b
patterns.name: keyword.control.flow.python

patterns.comment: a decorator may be a function call which returns a decorator.
patterns.name: meta.function.decorator.python

patterns.comment: Py2 print statement that should only be matched after function calls
patterns.name: keyword.other.print.python

patterns.begin: (?x)(?<!\.)\b(__importa__ | abs | todos | algún | ascii | basestring | bin | bool |arreglodebytes | bytes | invocable | car | métododeclase | cmp | compila |complejo | elimatr | dic | dir | divmód | enumera | valora | ejecuta |ejecarchivo | file | filtra | flota | formatea | conjuntoinmutable | obteneatr |globales | tieneatr | hash | ayuda | hex | id | entrada | ent |esinstancia | essubclase | iter | lar | lista | locales | long | mapea |máx | vistadememoria | min | siguiente | objeto | oct | abre | ord | pot |imprime | propiedad | rango | raw_input | reduce | reload | repr |invertido | redondea | conjunto | estableceatr | corta | ordenado | métodoestático |cad | suma | super | tupla | tipo | unichr | unicode | vars |xrange | comprime)\b\s*(?=\()
patterns.name: meta.function-call.python

builtin_functions_name.match: (?x)(?<!\.|@)        \b(__importa__ | abs | todos | algún | ascii | basestring | bin | bool |arreglodebytes | bytes | invocable | car | métododeclase | cmp | compila |complejo | elimatr | dic | dir | divmód | enumera | valora | ejecuta |ejecarchivo | file | filtra | flota | formatea | conjuntoinmutable | obteneatr |globales | tieneatr | hash | ayuda | hex | id | entrada | ent |esinstancia | essubclase | iter | lar | lista | locales | long | mapea |máx | vistadememoria | min | siguiente | objeto | oct | abre | ord | pot |propiedad | rango | raw_input | reduce | reload | repr |invertido | redondea | conjunto | estableceatr | corta | ordenado | métodoestático |cad | suma | super | tupla | tipo | unichr | unicode | vars |xrange | comprime)\b\s*(?!(\())
builtin_functions_name.name: support.function.builtin.name.python

builtin_types.comment:
These are from https://docs.python.org/X/library/stdtypes.html
      	  				where X is 2.7 or 3.5.
builtin_types.match: (?x)(?<!\.)\b(bool | buffer | arreglodebytes | bytes | complejo | dic | flota |conjuntoinmutable | ent | lista | long | vistadememoria | objeto | propiedad |rango | conjunto | corta | cad | tupla | tipo | unicode | xrange)\b(?!(\s*\())
builtin_types.name: support.type.python

errors_warnings_exceptions.match: (?x)\b((Arithmetic | Assertion | Attribute | Buffer | BlockingIO |BrokenPipe | ChildProcess | (Connection(Aborted | Refused | Reset)?) |EOF | Environment | FileExists | FileNotFound | FloatingPoint | IO |Import | Indentation | Index | Interrupted | IsADirectory |NotADirectory | Permission | ProcessLookup | Timeout | Key | Lookup |Memory | Name | NotImplemented | OS | Overflow | Reference | Runtime |Recursion | Standard | Syntax | System | Tab | Type | UnboundLocal |Unicode(Encode | Decode | Translate)? | Value | VMS | Windows |ZeroDivision | ([[:alpha:]_][[:alnum:]_]*))?Error|((Pending)?Deprecation | Bytes | Future | Import | Resource |Runtime | Syntax | Unicode | User | [[:alpha:]_][[:alnum:]_]*)?Warning|SystemExit | Stop(Async)?Iteration | NotImplemented |KeyboardInterrupt | GeneratorExit|([[:alpha:]_][[:alnum:]_]*)?Exception)\b
errors_warnings_exceptions.name: support.type.exception.python

illegal_names.comment: from Lib/keyword.py, in kwlist. `async` and `await` not keywords until Python 3.7 (according to PEP-0492)
illegal_names.match: (?x)      \b (        Falso | Nulo | Verdadero | y | como | asegura | rompe | clase | continúa | def |        elim | osi | otro | excepto | ejecuta | alfin | para | de | global | si |        importa | en | es | lambda | nolocal | no | o | omite | imprime | lanza |        devuelve | intenta | mientras | con | genera | __debug__ )      \b
illegal_names.name: invalid.illegal.name.python

patterns.begin: (?x)(\.)?\b(__(?:abs | add | aenter | aexit | aiter | y | asiguiente | aguarda | bool |bytes | call | ceil | cmp | class_getitem | coerce | complejo | contains |copy | deepcopy | elim | elimatr | delete | delitem | delslice | dir | div |divmód | enter | eq | execute | exit | flota | floor | floordiv | formatea |fspath | ge | get | obteneatr | getattribute | getinitargs | getitem |getnewargs | getnewargs_ex | getslice | getstate | gt | hash | hex | iadd |iand | idiv | idivmod | ifloordiv | ilshift | imatmul | imod | imul | index |init | init_subclass | instancecheck | ent | invert | iop | ior | ipow |irshift | isub | iter | itruediv | ixor | le | lar | length_hint | long |lshift | lt | main | matmul | missing | mod | mro_entries | mul | ne | neg |new | siguiente | nonzero | oct | op | o | pos | pot | prepare | radd | rand |rcmp | rdiv | rdivmod | reduce | reduce_ex | repr | invertido | rfloordiv |rlshift | rmatmul | rmod | rmul | rop | ror | redondea | rpow | rrshift |rshift | rsub | rtruediv | rxor | conjunto | set_name | estableceatr | setitem |setslice | setstate | sizeof | cad | sub | subclasscheck | subclasshook |truediv | trunc | unicode | xor)__)\s*(?=(\())
patterns.name: meta.function-call.python

magic_function_names.comment: These methods have magic interpretation by python and are generally   called indirectly through syntactic constructs. Names are from   https://docs.python.org/X/reference/datamodel.html where X is 2.7 and 3.5   See also http://www.rafekettler.com/magicmethods.html
magic_function_names.match: (?x)(def|\.)?\s*\b(__(?:abs | add | aenter | aexit | aiter | y | asiguiente | aguarda | bool |bytes | call | ceil | cmp | class_getitem | coerce | complejo | contains |copy | deepcopy | elim | elimatr | delete | delitem | delslice | dir | div |divmód | enter | eq | execute | exit | flota | floor | floordiv | formatea |fspath | ge | get | obteneatr | getattribute | getinitargs | getitem |getnewargs | getnewargs_ex | getslice | getstate | gt | hash | hex | iadd |iand | idiv | idivmod | ifloordiv | ilshift | imatmul | imod | imul | index |init | init_subclass | instancecheck | ent | invert | iop | ior | ipow |irshift | isub | iter | itruediv | ixor | le | lar | length_hint | long |lshift | lt | main | matmul | missing | mod | mro_entries | mul | ne | neg |new | next | nonzero | oct | op | o | pos | pot | prepare | radd | rand |rcmp | rdiv | rdivmod | reduce | reduce_ex | repr | invertido | rfloordiv |rlshift | rmatmul | rmod | rmul | rop | ror | redondea | rpow | rrshift |rshift | rsub | rtruediv | rxor | conjunto | set_name | estableceatr | setitem |setslice | setstate | sizeof | cad | sub | subclasscheck | subclasshook |truediv | trunc | unicode | xor)__)\b

magic_variable_names.comment: magic attributes which a class/module may have.
magic_variable_names.match: (?x)(\.)?\b(__(?:todos | annotations | bases | cached | clase | closure | code | debug |defaults | dic | doc | file | func | future | globales | kwdefaults |loader | members | metaclass | methods | module | mro | name | origin |package | path | qualname | self | slots | spec | subclasses | version |weakref | wrapped)__) \b

regular_expressions.comment: Changed disabled to 1 to turn off syntax highlighting in “r” strings.

patterns.comment: single quoted unicode-raw string without regular expression highlighting
patterns.name: string.quoted.double.block.unicode-raw.python

patterns.comment: single quoted bytes-raw string without regular expression highlighting
patterns.name: string.quoted.double.block.bytes-raw.python
